title: Return of the Watchers
outcome: Days after the silent protest, flyers appear across Stenograd listing names of those disappeared from BCI watchlists in March 2025. Neighborhood groups mobilize mass searches. Several missing citizens reappear, disoriented and hinting at clandestine detainment. Personal stories and analog communication further undermine public trust and disrupt Council alliances.

events.description: Flyers listing names of missing citizens appear in major squares, sparking citywide curiosity and anxiety.
Neighborhood groups organize searches, receiving analog tips about underground holding sites tied to vanished people.
Several previously flagged citizens suddenly return home; they avoid questions but show signs of psychological trauma.
Personal stories about hidden detainment circulate through hand-copied notes and spoken testimony, fueling outrage and suspicion.
The Harmonist bloc fractures in Council meetings, unable to reconcile the growing scandal and the loss of public trust.
